channel.title: visualization on eduard heller
channel.description: Recent content in visualization on eduard heller

item.title: Multi-User Virtual Reality Prototype in Unity
item.description: During my work as a research assistant, we developed a virtual reality framework as a team of six people. My areas of responsibility were the architecture, design and implementation of the Virtual Reality interactions and network programming of the framework.

item.title: GRACE Visualization Software
item.description: During my first semester I had to work on a visualization software. We dediced to go with visualiating the GRACE satellite data to show changes to the gravity. We used OpenGL, Vis and Java to implement this. You can find the source code here: https://github.com/eduardheller/GRACEVisualization.

item.title: Lindenmayer-Systems
item.description: Nothing to see here… Move along! https://github.com/eduardheller/Lindenmayer-System

item.title: Battle of the Throne
item.description: Battle of the Throne is a 3D-Towerdefense game made in C# and OpenGL. I wanted to practice to write some shaders and write a GUI-System on top of OpenGL. I was focusing on a stack based GUI-System to only have the top window focused on interactions. https://github.com/eduardheller/towerdefense/tree/master/TowerDefense

item.title: Image Processing Software
